thread.section_title: Bolt Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bolt Depot | www.boltdepot.com
thread.title: Stephen Wilmot
thread.title_full: Bolt Depot reviewed by Stephen Wilmot

author: Stephen Wilmot
title: Stephen Wilmot
text: This is one of the best websites I have ever used, it leads you through your bolt, nuts, and washer selections, types and sizes. The website also has very useful information on the different types of materials, which was very useful in making sure I had the right products. The prices are very reasonable and shipping was within a few days, cross country.
